title: RE Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
A fast-paced real estate team is looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Part-Time Real Estate Assistant to support lead generation and client engagement through strategic CRM use and LinkedIn outreach. Responsibilities include managing BrokerKit, building LinkedIn connections, coordinating emails, and following up with leads to boost conversions and retain clients. This position is ideal for someone skilled in real estate lead management, effective LinkedIn networking, and consistent follow-up, with strong organizational and communication abilities.

Responsibilities:
-Oversee CRM functions using BrokerKit, maintaining organized client records, tracking leads accurately, and managing timely follow-ups.
-Conduct targeted LinkedIn outreach to grow the professional network and attract high-quality real estate leads.
-Handle email communications, including responding to inquiries, managing client correspondence, and sending out promotional campaigns to keep leads engaged.
-Develop and maintain structured follow-up systems to turn leads into clients and foster long-term relationships.
-Keep the client database up-to-date with accurate contact details and a thorough record of all interactions to support seamless service.
-Track lead pipeline activity and offer recommendations on follow-up priorities and potential conversion opportunities.

Tools You’ll Be Working With:

-BrokerKit for CRM operations (essential)
-LinkedIn for professional outreach and networking (essential)
-Email Platforms for managing client communication and campaigns (essential)
-Phone and Messaging Tools for direct communication (essential)
-Lead Management Systems for tracking and organizing prospects (preferred but not required)
